# keyPath

**Instance Property**

The key path you want to modify on the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var keyPath: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This property must correspond to an animatable property of the view to which the motion effect is attached.

## Accessing the motion attributes

- **type**: The tilt direction to monitor.
- **minimumRelativeValue**: The value that maps to the minimum viewer offset.
- **maximumRelativeValue**: The value that maps to the maximum viewer offset.

items.description: The value that maps to the minimum viewer offset.
